Name: High Concept
Description: A character's primary aspect that describes the identity of the character. Examples include 'Fastest guns in the west' or 'Thief with a heart of gold'.

Name: Trouble
Description: A character's aspect that can get them into trouble (examples: 'Never backs down from a fight' or 'Drinks like a sailor')

Name: Aspect 1
Description: A two to six (approximately) word phrase describing something about a character

Name: Aspect 2
Description: A two to six (approximately) word phrase describing something about a character

Name: Fate Points
Description: The 'currency' of the gameâ€¦each player starts each session with 3 fate points and can spend them during the session to power various abilities.
